attributes.action: stop plans to remove holocaust from school curriculim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recieved email stating that the holocaust will be removed from school curriculim this was sent to me from USA, and if this is true, once again I am ashamed to be British, and this government should lower its head in shame, all our heritage and identity is being slowly erased from history by this weak government
